languages.text: {n}Кассия поджимает губы, заметив, как собравшиеся зеваки таращатся на ее руки, глаза, шею. Многие бесстыдно указывают пальцами в ее сторону, некоторые — сплевывает под ноги с нескрываемым отвращением. Высоко подняв подбородок, Леди-Навигатор поправляет когтистыми пальцами налобное украшение. Расправляет плечи. Выдыхает. И дарит толпе снисходительный взгляд.{/n}

{n}Cassia purses her lips when she notices the onlookers staring at her hands, eyes, and neck. Many point their fingers shamelessly in her direction; others spit at their feet in disgust. Her chin raised high, the Lady Navigator adjusts her forehead adornment with her clawed hands. She squares her shoulders, lets out a breath, and glares at the crowd with condescension.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия поджимает губы, заметив, как собравшиеся зеваки таращатся на ее руки, глаза, шею. Многие бесстыдно указывают пальцами в ее сторону, некоторые — сплевывает под ноги с нескрываемым отвращением. Высоко подняв подбородок, Леди-Навигатор поправляет когтистыми пальцами налобное украшение. Расправляет плечи. Выдыхает. И дарит толпе снисходительный взгляд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia purses her lips when she notices the onlookers staring at her hands, eyes, and neck. Many shamelessly point fingers in her direction, others spit at their feet in disgust. Her chin raised high, the Lady Navigator adjusts her forehead adornment with her clawed hands. She squares her shoulders, lets out a breath, and glances at the crowd with condescension.{/n}
{n}Cassia clenches her thin, clawed fingers into fists. Her lips are quivering, but she remains stoically silent.{/n}

languages.text: {n}卡西娅注意到周围的人盯着她的手、眼睛、脖子，立刻抿起了嘴。许多人厚颜无耻地对她的方向指指点点，还有的人一脸厌弃，朝脚下啐着口水。卡西娅扬起了头，长长的指甲调整着前额的饰品。她挺直肩膀，呼了一大口气，带着居高临下的神情瞪着周围的人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia purses her lips when she notices the onlookers staring at her hands, eyes, and neck. Many point their fingers shamelessly in her direction; others spit at their feet in disgust. Her chin raised high, the Lady Navigator adjusts her forehead adornment with her clawed hands. She squares her shoulders, lets out a breath, and glares at the crowd with condescension.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cassia aprieta los labios al percatarse de la gente que fija la mirada en sus manos, ojos y cuello. Muchos la señalan con descaro; otros escupen a sus pies con asco. Con la cabeza bien alta, la lady Navegante ajusta el accesorio de su frente con las garras de sus manos. Levanta los hombros, suspira y lanza una mirada condescendiente a la multitud.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia purses her lips when she notices the onlookers staring at her hands, eyes, and neck. Many point their fingers shamelessly in her direction; others spit at their feet in disgust. Her chin raised high, the Lady Navigator adjusts her forehead adornment with her clawed hands. She squares her shoulders, lets out a breath, and glares at the crowd with condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia aprieta los labios al percatarse de la gente que fija la mirada en sus manos, ojos y cuello. Muchos la señalan con descaro; otros escupen a sus pies con asco. Con la cabeza bien alta, la lady Navegante ajusta el accesorio de su frente con las garras de sus manos. Levanta los hombros, suspira y lanza una mirada condescendiente a la multitud.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Etraftakilerin ellerine, gözlerine ve boynuna baktığını fark eden Cassia, dudaklarını büzüyor. Birçoğu arsızca ona parmak sallıyor, diğerleri ise tiksintiyle ayaklarına tükürüyor. Leydi Rotacı, çenesini yukarı kaldırarak pençeli elleriyle alnındaki süslemeyi düzeltiyor. Omuzlarını dikleştirip nefes alıyor ve kalabalığa küçümseyerek bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia purses her lips when she notices the onlookers staring at her hands, eyes, and neck. Many point their fingers shamelessly in her direction; others spit at their feet in disgust. Her chin raised high, the Lady Navigator adjusts her forehead adornment with her clawed hands. She squares her shoulders, lets out a breath, and glares at the crowd with condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia, etraftakilerin ellerine, gözlerine ve boynuna baktığını fark ettiğinde dudaklarını büzüyor. Birçoğu arsızca ona parmak sallıyor, diğerleri ise tiksintiyle ayaklarına tükürüyor. Leydi Rotacı, çenesini yukarı kaldırarak pençeli elleriyle alnındaki süslemeyi düzeltiyor. Omuzlarını dikleştirip nefes alıyor ve kalabalığa küçümseyerek bakıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}カシアは、見物人たちが自分の手や目、首をじっと見つめているのに気づくと、唇を引き結んだ。多くは彼女に向かって遠慮なく指をさし、他の者たちは軽蔑して足元に唾を吐く。顎を高く上げ、レディ・ナヴィゲイターは爪のある手で額の装飾を整えた。肩を張り、息を吐いて、群衆を見下すような目つきでにらみつけた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia purses her lips when she notices the onlookers staring at her hands, eyes, and neck. Many point their fingers shamelessly in her direction; others spit at their feet in disgust. Her chin raised high, the Lady Navigator adjusts her forehead adornment with her clawed hands. She squares her shoulders, lets out a breath, and glares at the crowd with condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは、見物人たちが自分の手や目、首をじっと見つめているのに気づくと、唇を引き結んだ。多くは彼女に向かって遠慮なく指をさし、他の者たちは軽蔑して足元に唾を吐く。顎を高く上げ、レディ・ナヴィゲイターは爪のある手で額の装飾を整えた。肩を張り、息を吐いて、群衆を見下すような目つきでにらみつけた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cassia pince les lèvres en remarquant les regards inquisiteurs qui scrutent ses mains, ses yeux et son cou. Plusieurs d'entre eux n'hésitent pas à la désigner du doigt, tandis que d'autres crachent à ses pieds pour signifier leur dégoût. La dame navigatrice relève le menton et ajuste la pierre sur son front de ses mains griffues. Elle redresse les épaules, prend une profonde inspiration et balaie la foule d'un regard hautain.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia purses her lips when she notices the onlookers staring at her hands, eyes, and neck. Many point their fingers shamelessly in her direction; others spit at their feet in disgust. Her chin raised high, the Lady Navigator adjusts her forehead adornment with her clawed hands. She squares her shoulders, lets out a breath, and glares at the crowd with condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia pince les lèvres en remarquant les regards inquisiteurs qui scrutent ses mains, ses yeux et son cou. Plusieurs d'entre eux n'hésitent pas à la désigner du doigt, tandis que d'autres crachent à ses pieds pour signifier leur dégoût. La dame navigatrice relève le menton et ajuste la pierre sur son front de ses mains griffues. Elle redresse les épaules, prend une profonde inspiration et balaie la foule d'un regard hautain.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cassia schürzt die Lippen, als sie bemerkt, wie die Umstehenden ihre Hände, Augen und ihren Hals anstarren. Viele zeigen schamlos in ihre Richtung, andere spucken ihr angeekelt vor die Füße. Mit erhobenem Kinn rückt der Lady Navigator seine Stirnverzierung mit seinen Klauenhänden zurecht. Sie strafft ihre Schultern, atmet tief aus und blickt die Menge herablassend an.{/n}

She squares her shoulders, lets out a breath, and glares at the crowd with condescension.{/n}
